pkgmetadata.longdescription: # AMY Plugin[Amy Assistant](http://amy-assistant.at)Just import amy to write your plugin.```pyfrom amy import Plugin, Instance, Messageclass Messenger(FacebookClient, Instance): def onCreate(self, username): self.username = username def onAuth(self, token): FacebookClient.__init__(self, self.username, token) def onStart(self): FacebookClient.listen() def onStop(self): FacebookClient.stopListening() def myNewMessageFunc(message) unifiedMessage = Message() .setPlatform('messanger') # .setUser(message['user']) # ... Plugin.publishMessange(unifiedMessage.toDict())def main(): Messenger = Plugin('messenger', Messenger)if __name__ == "__main__": main()```
